Source.Name: qt5-x11extras
Source.Description: Qt X11 Extras enables the Qt programmer to write applications for the Linux/X11 platform. Applications developed with Qt can also be deployed across several other desktop and embedded operating systems without having to rewrite the source code.

Package.Name: qt5-x11extras
Package.Description: Qt X11 Extras enables the Qt programmer to write applications for the Linux/X11 platform. Applications developed with Qt can also be deployed across several other desktop and embedded operating systems without having to rewrite the source code.
